My site loads a bunch of quick and easy recipies using pagination Here is how to run my website

Use the terminal to download the following: npm install @11ty/eleventy

To run 11ty :

npm install ejs npm install sass npx @11ty/eleventy

To run strapi: npx create-strapi-app assign1 --quickstart cd assign1 npm run develop Click on link and log in

cd strapi npm install node-fetch node fetch-strapi.mjs node rec-fetch-strapi.mjs

Then to launch the website to a broswer: npx @11ty/eleventy --serve
